basicDistinguisherobject

disambig.t[101]

Superclass

Summary

Property
Details

Details

"Basic" Distinguisher. This distinguisher can tell two objects apart if one or the other object is not marked as isEquivalent, OR if the two objects don't have an identical superclass list. This distinguisher thus can tell apart objects unless they're "basic equivalents," marked with isEquivalent and having the same equivalence keys. **`basicDistinguisher`**` :   `[`Distinguisher`](../object/Distinguisher.html)

Superclass Tree   (in declaration order)
